scripts.build:vendors:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production         browserify -r react -r react-dom -r prop-types                                   -g [ loose-envify purge --NODE_ENV production ] | uglifyjs --compress=unused,dead_code -o vendors/js/vendors.min.js
scripts.build:dev-box-ui:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production     browserify -r ./src/lib/:dev-box-ui -x react -x react-dom -x prop-types          -g [ loose-envify purge --NODE_ENV production ] | uglifyjs --compress=unused,dead_code -o build/dist/js/dev-box-ui.min.js
scripts.build:demo: browserify -x react -x react-dom -x prop-types -x dev-box-ui                     --debug -o demo/js/demo.js demo.js
